Main: ^You wake up after a nap, having eaten a large amount of bread and falling into a food coma. You find yourself in a cozy spot under a dock, in Canadian Cottage Contry. It's a simple, well fed life.
First_GoToLand: ^You waddle onto land, walking through some tall grass. You don't really see anyone or anything, so you conside where to go next.

s: ^You feel hungry, so you head towards the nearby cottage in the hope of free food.
^You feel lonely, so you head towards the location of a large clearing.

Second_GoToCottage: ^You head towards the quaint little cottage, hoping you’ll find a snack. But before you can get too close to the cottage, you’re suddenly knocked over by a big white blur.
^You look up to see a large white goose with a golden bell in
^ say "sorry" but it’s hard to tell because
^'s talking with a large, tingling bell in in
^’s already taken off further away from the cottage. You stare at
^ in confusion, not really understanding what's just happened.
^That's when you notice there's a farmer running towards you, seemingly really angry, as he chases the white goose.
Second_FollowWGoose: ^You follow the goose, not sure what's possessing you. You can hear the angry farmer behind you, yelling unfriendly words, and hear him waving his rake in the sky. It's not long before you stumble upon a clearing of canadian geese, who are panicking at the site of you. The geese are everywhere, and it's a mess of feathers and screams - both bird and human.
^Except on the side of the clearing, you see a solitary canadian goose.
^ stands seperate to the rest, and
^'s wearing a cool pair of sunglasses. They make
^ look intimidating, yet intriguing, despite them being shaped for humans and not really fitting
^ seems ready to leave, but in a cool, composed fashion, unlike the scrambling and screaming geese.
Second_GoToClearing: ^As you approach the clearing, you see and smell a large gathering of Canadian geese. They seem to be arguing about directions, so you hesitate entering the clearing incase a fight starts. You have had a lot of bad experiences in the past with Canadian geese, the highest temper of any goose.
^Hovering at the edge of the clearing, you realize there's a goose beside you that you didn't notice.
^ beak. They're human sunglasses, so they don't fit very well, but they give
^ an air of mysterium. You feel nervous as
^ says casually, leaning against a tree as
^ sunglasses down. "What are you doing here?"
^"N-nothing", you reply, turning away with a blush. Why is
^ so cool? You wish you could be that cool. "Why aren't you with the other geese."
^ sunglasses back up with a feather and glances away dramatically. "I'm not like them, I don't migrate."
^"Oh, why not?" you wonder, as you both watch a fight break out among the geese who think South is North and North is South.
^ seems unaffected, which is so cool.
^'s a proper bad boy, and you might be intrigued.
^"I've got a cool set up here,"
^ shrugs, laughing when a goose runs away in fear from another one flapping his wings.
^ turns to you, "I haven't seen you around much, do you come here often?"
^"Sometimes," you try to play off casually, wondering if
^ is flirting with you. "My name is
^ doesn't immediately respond, distracted by how the goose fight has started calming down.
^ looks like he's getting ready to leave.
^Suddenly out of nowhere a white goose comes running towards the clearing, with a bell ringing loudly in

^ beak. There's a farmer right behind him, chasing him and waving a rake, as he runs through the group of canadian geese. The geese swarm in panic, making a chaotic mess, running away from the angry farmer. The white goose runs in a straight line, not looking back, and is seemingly determined to keep to
^ wings, ready to fly away from the chaos happening in the clearing.

s: ^You want to know more about sunglasses goose, you fly after
^You are curious what the white goose is doing, you follow the
^You can't decide! You wait to talk to the farmer.

Third_FollowCGoose: ^You decide to get out of there, you don't want to be involved in the panic. You flap your wings and try to take off after the sunglasses goose, but
^ canadian goose wings are bigger than yours and
^ quickly overtakes you. You flap desperately, but you watch as
^ lands at the bank of the lake, and gets on a jet ski.
^You're stunned: how could someone be this cool?

s: ^You decide to go find the white goose instead.

Fourth_CallCGoose: ^ turns back at the sound of your voice and winks, but slows down enough for you to catch up. You land breathless on the back of the jet ski, and cling desperately to
^ pushes the pedals to go even faster.
Fifth_JetSkiCGoose: ^It feels like you're flying! You can normally fly, but this is a different sensation because it requires no effort of your own! You're flying while also resting, it's glorious. You let your feathers fly free in the wind, enjoying the feeling of complete freedom.
^ is silent as you send out a loud "WOOOOOOH!", but it feels like you're sharing a moment together.
^Unfortunately, you woke up pretty late so the sun is starting to set.

^ swerves the jet ski to a stop, spraying water behind both of you, and for a moment you're both silent as you watch the sunset. It's beautiful, peaceful, and a little bit scary to watch the red take over the landscape.
^You let out a breath you didn't know you were hiding, and
^ says smoothly, resting a wing on your shoulder.
^," you introduce, feeling your feathers turn red.
^"It's getting late, let's get you home,"
^"No!" You rush to insist: you've been having so much fun, you never want this night to end.
^"I'll pick you up tomorrow morning, ok doll? Where do you live?"
^, agreeing with him and directing him back to your dock. You get off the jet ski, and watch him drive off into the final remains of the sunset, now a deep red. You hope he does come back.
Fourth_FindWGoose: ^ is way out of your league, and you abandon following him. He was too cool for you, you need someone more like you. You turn back and realize you can still hear the faint "ding ding" of a bell in the distance. You decide to fly towards that, to figure out what the white goose was stealing the bell for. You fly for a bit before you see a white flash through some trees, and a human yelling angrily. You land to have better navigation between the trees, and then start running towards him as fast as you can.
Third_FollowWGoose: ^You head after the white goose, waddling as fast as you can to catch up. The farmer is lagging behind because of all the canadian geese blocking his path, but he's hitting them away with his rake and pushing through the chaotic bird fest as much as possible. Luckily, your small size allows you to squeeze through gaps between the canadian geese and catch up with the white goose quickly.
Third_CatchUpWGoose: ^As you get closer, you notice the white goose is laughing so hard as
^ can barely keep the bell in
^ mouth. You're suddenly even more intrigued. What is
^ goal? What will the bell achieve? You rush harder, using all the muscles in your little legs and balance your head forwards to run even faster because you'll be aerodynamic.
^Eventually the farmer gives up the chase and you both stop to rest, huffing and puffing loudly through the nose holes in your beaks.
^"Why did you need that bell so badly?" you ask, impressed by
^ replies easily, "I just think it’s funny.  Did you see the look on that farmer’s face?  That’s comedy gold right there!"
^ falls over for a moment, before getting back up and picking up

^ throws the bell into a pit full of random objects. The pit is full of objects that you've seen humans use, some look like trash but others are very valuable. You can see the honoured water tube - used by children everywhere to enjoy the water like you can. You've always wanted one, but humans are so protective of their things. You've always seen humans lock them in a room at night, you have no idea how this white goose acquired them.
^The white goose continues laughing, walking away from his hord.

s: ^Go with the white goose, he seems funny!
^Go somewhere else, this guy seems like a jerk!
^You try to steal something from the pit.

Fourth_Follow2WGoose: ^This goose’s “do-what-I-want” attitude is so much fun! You continue following him, a bit awkwardly, but he smiles at you so you keep following him.
^"What's your name," you ask shyly, hiding behind your beak. "My name is
^ of course! Have you not heard of me?"
^ replies confidentally, flapping his wings in excitement.
^ is so happy, and so excited, that you can't resist pretending you know who
^"Of course I have!" You insist, flapping your wings a little bit too. You don't normally do this except to fly, but
^ seems to do it to express
^self so you want to get along.
^ flaps a bit more violently in response, before calming down.
^Now that you have your chance, you ask
^ exclaims, jumping a bit. "I've done so many things, and the farmer gets so mad! He's almost never caught me too, don't worry, I'm safe."
^"Really?" You ask interested, "what have you done before?"
^"One time I stole the farmer's keys! He was farming his plants or something, so I just grabbed them! He ran after me, but of course I have more stamina."
^"Of course!" You exclaim, amazed by his stories. You've used humans for food before, but never done something like this. Usually, your ease of survival depends on humans liking you. The idea that
^ doesn't depend on humans is so impressive, you're sure
^"And then I broke into his house! He chased me for hours, it was thrilling!"
^You can't help it: you're also flapping your wings without control now. Everything
^"Please! Please tell me more," you insist, running a bit to catch up because you stopped walking in your star-struckness.
^ considers, tapping the chin of his beak with
^ wing. "I have plans after this to steal something else..."
^"Can I come!" You beg, holding your wings up together. "You're soo cool!"
^ still seems hestitant. "This mission needs maximum stealth..."
^"But... maybe tomorrow, I have something smaller planned. If you'd be interested in that?"
^ asks, before he looks away shyly.
^"OK!" You agree, and you realize it's getting dark anyway. This is probably a good plan. "I'm really looking forward to it."
^ blushes, and looks away embarassed. "I-I'll see you tomorrow?"
^"Ok!" You reply, enthusiasm dominating everything. "I'll see you!" You declare, before turning away to fly back towards your dock.
Fourth_StealWGoose: ^You can't resist, you reach down to try to steal the inner tube in the pit. You're just about to grasp it in your wing, using your feather fingers to lift it, when you hear someone yell, "HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING!"
^You turn around, it's the white goose. In your urgency, you didn't notice he hadn't left and now
^'s also bigger than you, and as
^ wing's in rage, you feel afraid. You run away in fear, going back to hide in your dock under it.

^From then on, wherever you go, you're met with shame. Birds turn away from you, hide their possessions from you. Mothers get angry when you come near their eggs, no one feels safe with you. No one wants to be associated with you. You're a white duck.
^You spend the rest of your life alone, hiding under your dock incase someone gets angry at your presence, and waiting for the sweet release of death.
Third_WaitFarmer: ^You wait for the farmer as the white goose keeps running, hoping to reconcile with the man. The farmer seems to stop in confusion when he sees you're the only bird to stay behind.
^“Quack”, you say to the farmer, “quack quackquack quack quack quack quack quack quackquack quack”.
^The farmer stares at you for a second with a blank expression on his face, then hits you with his rake.
^What were you thinking?! Ducks can’t speak English.
First_GoToWater: ^You push off dock and swim towards the middle of the lake you inhabit. It seems to be a quiet day since the sun isn't out, there are no dangerous robots zooming past.
^You feel hungry, you try diving for some food.
^You feel tired, you go back and rest near the bank.
Second_GoDiving: ^You dive underwater, the hunger in you overwhelming your mind with the thought of yummy, yummy aquatic plants. Instead of finding some tasty greens, all of a sudden something hits you underwater. In shock, you spurt around the water. You panic before rising from the surface, where you then see a looking.

^"I'm so sorry! The loon says, talking quickly in panic. "I was chasing this fish, and it was almost getting away from me, and I really didn't mean to!! I'm soo sorry, please forgive me! I'll do anything!"
^"It's ok," you reassure, pecking the loon with your beak. "Don't worry about it." You can't help but think the loon is cute -
^'s so embrassed, but it wasn't that big of a deal. You want to make sure
^ says, smiling slightly. "Would you maybe.. want the fish?"
^"Oh no!" You insist. "I'm sorry, I'm a vegan..."
^"Not that there's anything wrong with you not being vegan! It's okay, it's just my choice," you insist, and the loon seems to perk up. "I just... don't."
^"Ok!" The loon says, seemingly please. "My name is
^ by the way... uhm, what's yours?"

^!" You reply, but before you can continue your pleasent conversation, all of a sudden a large boat comes shooting towards you. You scream in panic, but you're too slow to react - it's coming straight for you.
^You see your life flash before your eyes.
^You're not sure if you're ok with this being the end. Have you really lived your life? Have you done everything you've ever wanted to? You don't think so. This can't be the end.
^Seconds before the boat impacts you, the loon grabs you and then dives underwater.
^You're used to diving small distances for food, but the loon takes you deeper than usual. It's a strange feeling, a feeling of weightlessness that you've never felt before.
^You surface together a small distance away.
^"Oh my duck!" You scream once you surface, coughing up water you didn't mean to inhale.
^ asks in panic, desperately clutching your body.
^You cough a couple more times before you manage to get out, "I'm alright! Don't worry!" You're panting for breath, but you honestly feel okay. "You saved my life," you gasp, staring at

^, a small smile on his beak. "If something had happened to you... I don't know what I would've done." There's a glint in his normally red, making it redder than usual. You feel a chill run down your spine, but you try to wave it off.
^"Yeah don't worry, haha!" You insist, trying to calm
^ down. You don't want him to stress too much over you, now that you've regained your breath, you feel ok.
^"Maybe we should leave the water?" The loon questions, offering to support you.

s: ^You agree the lake is too dangerous today, and head back to the shore with the loon.
^You disagree, you want to go for a swim.

Third_BankLoon: ^ head back to the shore to avoid any further mishaps, and
^ wings around you for the whole way back. It feels more comforting than you're used to, and you let yourself lean into it.

s: ^You get on the jet ski with the canadian goose,
^You decide to the stay with the loon,
^ seems scared since the boat incident.

Round2: ^You've had a long day, so you decide to go to sleep. As you cuddle up under your dock, you think back on all the adventures you had today, and feel content as you let yourself rest to sleep, dreaming of a certain bird. Your life has been empty before today, but maybe now it has meaning.
^The next morning, your jolted awake when you hear something. You open your eyes, and you see...
